charges.charge_description: 18:2252(a)(2) and (b)(1) - ACTIVITIES RE MATERIAL CONSTITUTING/CONTAINING CHILD PORNO(1)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP 108 months to run concurrent for a total of 108 months. $100 special assessment. 10 years supervised release with special and standard conditions to run concurrent. Forfeiture provision.
